title: ISic000371. I.Sicily inscription 000371
body:
Facsimile Images

D (is) M (anibus) s (acrum)
[P(ubli)?] Sextili Severi
P (ublius) Sextilius Stephanio
patri piissimo
5vixit annos LX

Apparatus criticus

Text of Korhonen 2004

English translation

Sacred to the Spirits of the Underworld. To Publius Sextilius Severus, erected by Publius Sextilius Stephanio for his most pious father, lived for 60 years

commentary

bibliography

  • 10.7089 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000589
  • 128 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
